<!-- repo: clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk -->
<!-- ref: main -->
<!-- commit: 2afaff8ba0707d6a911900e055670caf6ea9fa4d -->
<!-- generated_at: 2026-02-13T09:23:47Z -->
# Platform: React Native

## /
- [Readme](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/README.md): Developer-facing README detailing installation, peer dependencies, React Native/Firebase setup, Clix initialization (`Clix.initialize`), user management APIs, notification handling via `NotificationService.
- [Changelog](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/CHANGELOG.md): CHANGELOG documenting SDK semantic-version history and notable releases (trackEvent, Clix.Notification facade, session tracking, iOS Live Activities, background push handlers, FCM/Notifee integration, device/user APIs), guiding upgrade impacts and dependencies.
- [License](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/LICENSE): Defines the SDK’s modified MIT license, granting standard use/modify/distribute rights but legally restricting all substantial use to Clix services and disallowing repurposing for unrelated platforms without explicit permission.
- [Package](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/package.json): Package.json for @clix-so/react-native-sdk declares SDK entry points (.
- [Tsconfig](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/tsconfig.json): TypeScript compiler configuration enforcing strict type-safety and noEmit, React JSX and bundler moduleResolution, mapping package alias @clix-so/react-native-sdk →./src/index, targeting ESNext with noUnused/noUnchecked checks and resolveJsonModule for build/IDE tooling.
- [Tsconfig.build](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/tsconfig.build.json): TypeScript build configuration that extends the base `tsconfig`, excluding `samples` and compiled `lib` output from the build to control which source files are processed and emitted.
- [Babel.config](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/babel.config.js): Configures Babel to use `react-native-builder-bob` presets for the SDK source and `@react-native/babel-preset` for `node_modules`, ensuring correct transpilation behavior for library code versus external dependencies.

## samples/BasicApp
- [React Native.config](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/samples/BasicApp/react-native.config.js): React Native configuration for the BasicApp sample that enables automatic CocoaPods installation, maps the SDK dependency to the repository root (pkg.name), and explicitly sets iOS as a platform (empty object) while disabling Android to avoid codegen failures.
- [Index](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/samples/BasicApp/index.js): Bootstraps the sample by importing @clix-so/react-native-sdk, calling Clix.initialize(config) with src/assets/clix_config.
- [Metro.config](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/samples/BasicApp/metro.config.js): Metro config merging defaults that sets projectRoot/watchFolders to the repo root, maps peerDependencies from the sample's package.json into extraNodeModules, blocks duplicate modules under the root node_modules, and enables inlineRequires transformer.
- [Babel.config](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/samples/BasicApp/babel.config.js): Exports the sample app's Babel configuration by calling react-native-builder-bob's getConfig with module:@react-native/babel-preset, passing the repo root and package.json to enable monorepo-aware transforms and consistent React Native compilation.

## samples/BasicApp/android/app/src/main/kotlin/so/clix/samples/basic
- [Mainactivity](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/samples/BasicApp/android/app/src/main/kotlin/so/clix/samples/basic/MainActivity.kt): Android MainActivity that bootstraps the React Native host for the sample app by extending ReactActivity, exposing the main JS component "ClixSample" and instantiating DefaultReactActivityDelegate wired to fabricEnabled (New Architecture Fabric toggle).
- [Mainapplication](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/samples/BasicApp/android/app/src/main/kotlin/so/clix/samples/basic/MainApplication.kt): MainApplication.kt configures the app's ReactNativeHost and ReactHost (using DefaultReactNativeHost and getDefaultReactHost), supplies PackageList-based packages, JS main module "index", dev/Hermes/new-arch flags from BuildConfig, and initializes SoLoader plus new-architecture entry on onCreate.

## samples/BasicApp/ios/ClixSample
- [Main](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/samples/BasicApp/ios/ClixSample/main.m): Defines the iOS app entry point: imports UIKit and AppDelegate, wraps UIApplicationMain call in an autorelease pool to instantiate UIApplication and launch the app using AppDelegate as principal delegate, starting the app lifecycle and run loop.
- [Appdelegate](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/samples/BasicApp/ios/ClixSample/AppDelegate.mm): iOS AppDelegate that initializes Firebase and ClixLiveActivitySetup, constructs the React Native RCTBridge/RCTRootView (application:didFinishLaunchingWithOptions:), sets the window/rootViewController, and implements sourceURLForBridge: to load dev or bundled JS.

## samples/BasicApp/src
- [App](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/samples/BasicApp/src/App.tsx): React Native sample app demonstrating Clix SDK integration: on mount it asynchronously fetches deviceId/pushToken (Clix.getDeviceId, Clix.

## src
- [Index](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/src/index.ts): Package entry point that re-exports the default Clix SDK class from./core/Clix and the ClixLogLevel enum from.

## src/core
- [Clixnotification](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/src/core/ClixNotification.ts): Singleton wrapper that delegates to Clix.shared.
- [Clixinitcoordinator](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/src/core/ClixInitCoordinator.ts): ClixInitCoordinator manages SDK initialization synchronization by exposing waitForInitialization() (awaits internal Promise), completeInitialization() (resolves and marks complete), and failInitialization() (logs via ClixLogger, rejects and marks failed), preventing double-finalization.
- [Clix](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/src/core/Clix.ts): Singleton Clix SDK entrypoint that initializes API/client/services (Storage, Token, Device, Event, Session, Notification, LiveActivity) via ClixAPIClient, persists config, orchestrates startup with ClixInitCoordinator, and exposes async APIs: initialize, set/remove userId/properties, trackEvent, getDeviceId, setLogLevel.
- [Clixconfig](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/src/core/ClixConfig.ts): Exports the ClixConfig TypeScript interface defining SDK configuration (projectId, apiKey, endpoint, extraHeaders, ClixLogLevel and optional sessionTimeoutMs); imports ClixLogLevel and has no runtime side effects.
- [Clixversion](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/src/core/ClixVersion.ts): Static ClixVersion exposes getVersion(): Promise<string>, which reads and caches package.json's version via require('.

## src/models
- [Clixuserproperty](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/src/models/ClixUserProperty.ts): Defines PropertyType enum and ClixUserProperty model with a constructor plus static of(name, value) that infers type (String/Number/Boolean), stores codable value in valueString, and exposes equals and toString methods; no external dependencies or side effects.
- [Clixpushnotificationpayload](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/src/models/ClixPushNotificationPayload.ts): TypeScript interface ClixPushNotificationPayload defines the SDK's push-notification payload shape (messageId, title, body, optional imageUrl/landingUrl, userJourneyId/userJourneyNodeId) used by notification handlers and engagement/delivery flows and exported for typing across modules.
- [Clixdevice](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/src/models/ClixDevice.ts): ClixDevice is an immutable TypeScript model with readonly properties encapsulating device/app/sdk metadata (IDs, platform/model/manufacturer, OS, locale, timezone, app/sdk versions, adId, push permission/token), exposing a constructor and copyWith(updates: Partial<ClixDevice>) to produce updated instances.

## src/services
- [Sessionservice](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/src/services/SessionService.ts): SessionService listens to React Native AppState, persists last-activity timestamps via StorageService, enforces a min-5s session timeout to start or continue sessions, and emits SESSION_START via EventService.trackEvent with optional pendingMessageId; public APIs: start(), setPendingMessageId(), cleanup().
- [Liveactivityservice](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/src/services/LiveActivityService.ts): LiveActivityService subscribes to native push-to-start token events (subscribeToPushToStartToken), forwarding tokens to liveActivityAPIService.registerLiveActivityStartToken using deviceService.
- [Liveactivityapiservice](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/src/services/LiveActivityAPIService.ts): LiveActivityAPIService (depends on ClixAPIClient and ClixLogger) exposes registerLiveActivityStartToken(deviceId, activityType, token): Promise<void> to POST /devices/{deviceId}/live-activity-start-tokens, logs progress, and throws on non-2xx or request errors.
- [Notificationservice](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/src/services/NotificationService.ts): NotificationService initializes push listeners (notifee + FCM), displays notifee notifications, parses Clix payloads, tracks PUSH_RECEIVED/TAPPED via EventService, updates tokens/permissions via Device/Token services, exposes initialize/cleanup/requestPermission, handler hooks, and auto-opens landing URLs.
- [Deviceservice](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/src/services/DeviceService.ts): DeviceService manages local device identity and ClixDevice creation (using react-native-device-info, Firebase Messaging, ClixVersion), persists/generated device ID via StorageService, saves FCM token via TokenService, and upserts device/user properties through DeviceAPIService via public APIs: initialize, createDevice, updatePushToken/Permission, set/removeProjectUserId, update/removeUserProperties.
- [Tokenservice](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/src/services/TokenService.ts): TokenService wraps a StorageService to persist and retrieve the current push token under key 'clix_current_push_token', exposing constructor(storageService), getCurrentToken(): string|undefined and saveToken(token): void.
- [Storageservice](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/src/services/StorageService.ts): StorageService wraps react-native-mmkv (v2/v3/v4), providing multi-process, App Group path-aware MMKV initialization (per-project id), JSON-encoded set/get with legacy string migration, remove/clear/getAllKeys utilities, and resilient error logging via ClixLogger.
- [Eventapiservice](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/src/services/EventAPIService.ts): EventAPIService uses a ClixAPIClient to POST an events array to /events via trackEvent(deviceId,name,properties,messageId?,userJourneyId?
- [Deviceapiservice](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/src/services/DeviceAPIService.ts): DeviceAPIService wraps ClixAPIClient to perform network upserts and deletes for devices and device-scoped user data—exposing upsertDevice, set/removeProjectUserId, upsert/removeUserProperties; logs via ClixLogger, maps model fields, and throws on non-2xx HTTP responses.
- [Clixapiclient](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/src/services/ClixAPIClient.ts): ClixAPIClient provides get/post/put/delete methods to call Clix API under /api/v1, building URLs from ClixConfig.endpoint, attaching project ID and API key and SDK User-Agent (from ClixVersion), delegating to HTTPClient.
- [Eventservice](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/src/services/EventService.ts): EventService serializes Date properties (via ClixDateFormatter), obtains the current deviceId from DeviceService, and exposes async trackEvent(name, properties?, messageId?

## src/utils
- [Types](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/src/utils/types.ts): Type-level utilities exporting Prettify<T> (forces a flattened/expanded displayed type) and PickPartial<T, K> (makes keys K optional while keeping others required via Omit/Partial/Pick), pure compile-time helpers with no runtime side effects.
- [Clixdateformatter](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/src/utils/ClixDateFormatter.ts): Exports ClixDateFormatter.format (static) which converts a Date to a local ISO-like timestamp YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS±HH:MM, zero-padding components and computing timezone via getTimezoneOffset; pure utility with no external dependencies.
- [Uuid](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/src/utils/UUID.ts): Provides static UUID.generate() returning a UUID v4 (using react-native-get-random-values uuid), logs via ClixLogger.
- [Clixerror](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/src/utils/ClixError.ts): Defines ClixErrorCode enum and ClixError class (extends Error) providing standardized error codes/messages, optional cause support, name 'ClixError', and static factory methods (notInitialized, invalidConfiguration, invalidURL, invalidResponse, encodingError, decodingError, networkError, unknownError), with unknownError appending an optional reason to the message for SDK...

## src/utils/logging
- [Clixlogger](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/src/utils/logging/ClixLogger.ts): Provides a simple, dependency-free logging utility (ClixLogger) with ClixLogLevel enum, level filtering via setLogLevel/shouldLog, timestamped console output (console.debug/info/warn/error), and convenience methods error/warn/info/debug accepting an optional error.

## ios
- [Clixliveactivitymodule](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/ios/ClixLiveActivityModule.swift): Bridges iOS ActivityKit push-to-start tokens to React Native by exposing ClixLiveActivityModule RCTEventEmitter ('onPushToStartToken'), with a static setup(activityType) for AppDelegate (iOS 17.2+), buffering pending setups and tokens until initialized.
- [Clixliveactivitymodule](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/ios/ClixLiveActivityModule.m): Declares and registers the native iOS module "ClixLiveActivityModule" (implemented in Swift) as an RCTEventEmitter for React Native, exposing event-emission capability to JavaScript via the React bridge (imports RCTBridgeModule/RCTEventEmitter).
- [Clixliveactivity](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/ios/ClixLiveActivity.swift): Provides a public facade (compile-guarded by canImport(ActivityKit), iOS 16.1+) exposing static setup<Attributes: ActivityAttributes>(_:) to call from AppDelegate to begin listening for push-to-start tokens, delegating to ClixLiveActivityModule.
- [Clixappgroupdirectory](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/ios/ClixAppGroupDirectory.m): React Native Objective-C module (RCT_EXPORT_MODULE) that resolves and caches the app bundle ID, constructs the "group.clix.

## samples/BasicApp/ios/ClixNotificationExtension
- [Notificationservice](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/samples/BasicApp/ios/ClixNotificationExtension/NotificationService.swift): NotificationService.swift defines a UNNotificationServiceExtension subclass that reads projectId from clix_config.

## src/native
- [Clixliveactivitybridge](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/src/native/ClixLiveActivityBridge.ts): Bridges to the iOS ClixLiveActivityModule, exposing subscribeToPushToStartToken(callback) that registers a NativeEventEmitter listener for 'onPushToStartToken' (PushToStartTokenEvent), returning an EmitterSubscription or undefined if not iOS/module missing and logging via ClixLogger.
- [Getappgroupdirectory](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/src/native/getAppGroupDirectory.ts): Exports getAppGroupDirectory(), which on iOS resolves the native 'ClixAppGroupDirectory' via react-native NativeModules, invokes getAppGroupDirectory() to return a non-empty path string (or undefined), and logs debug/warn via ClixLogger on failure.

## src/utils/http
- [Httpresponse](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/src/utils/http/HTTPResponse.ts): Defines a generic HTTPResponse<T> interface with data, statusCode, and headers, used as the standardized return shape for the SDK's HTTP client/utilities to type successful responses and downstream parsing/error handling (no external dependencies).
- [Httprequest](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/src/utils/http/HTTPRequest.ts): Exports the HTTPRequest interface for the SDK HTTP client, modeling network requests with url, method (HTTPMethod), optional params: Record<string, any>, headers: Record<string, string>, and request body (data).
- [Httpmethod](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/src/utils/http/HTTPMethod.ts): Exports the HTTPMethod enum (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE) used across the SDK to strongly-type request method strings for HTTP utilities and network clients, ensuring consistent method values in request builders and fetch wrappers.
- [Httpclient](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/src/utils/http/HTTPClient.ts): Provides an HTTPClient singleton wrapping fetch (request/get/post/put/delete), building URL-encoded query strings, JSON-stringifying request bodies except for GET/DELETE, parsing JSON/text responses, converting response headers to Record<string,string>, and depending on HTTPMethod/HTTPRequest/HTTPResponse.

## samples/BasicApp/ios
- [Liveactivitymanager](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/samples/BasicApp/ios/LiveActivityManager.swift): iOS 16.2+ @MainActor singleton managing ActivityKit Live Activities for DeliveryActivityAttributes, exposing ObservableObject state (isActive) and public APIs start(), update(status:), end() to request, async-update (Task/await) and end activities (pushType.
- [Deliveryactivityattributes](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/samples/BasicApp/ios/DeliveryActivityAttributes.swift): Defines DeliveryActivityAttributes conforming to ActivityKit ActivityAttributes with nested ContentState (status and estimatedDeliveryTime) and top-level orderNumber and restaurantName to model and update iOS Live Activity state.
- [Clixliveactivitysetup](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/samples/BasicApp/ios/ClixLiveActivitySetup.swift): Objective-C-exposed utility that conditionally (iOS 16.1+) initializes the clix_react_native_sdk live activity by calling ClixLiveActivity.

## samples/BasicApp/ios/DeliveryLiveActivityWidget
- [Deliveryliveactivitywidgetliveactivity](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/samples/BasicApp/ios/DeliveryLiveActivityWidget/DeliveryLiveActivityWidgetLiveActivity.swift): Defines DeliveryLiveActivityWidget, a WidgetKit/ActivityKit SwiftUI Live Activity implementing ActivityConfiguration for DeliveryActivityAttributes (lock‑screen/banner and Dynamic Island layouts), rendering UI from context.attributes/state, with statusIcon mapping helper and preview extensions.
- [Deliveryliveactivitywidgetbundle](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/samples/BasicApp/ios/DeliveryLiveActivityWidget/DeliveryLiveActivityWidgetBundle.swift): Defines the WidgetKit @main entry point (DeliveryLiveActivityWidgetBundle) that registers and bundles the DeliveryLiveActivityWidget, importing SwiftUI and WidgetKit and exposing the WidgetBundle body as the runtime entry for the widget extension.
